title: Understanding Substances
text: A substance is often defined as a chemical compound that can alter the mind or body. It is important to recognize the potential for dependence and the effects it can have on an individual's health.

title: Characteristics of Substances
text: Substances are known for their psychoactive properties, meaning they can affect the brain and lead to changes in mood, perception, and behavior.

hintAnswer: a psychoactive compound with the potential for dependence and detrimental effects
title: Identifying a Substance
text: Which of the following best describes a substance?
choices: repeated use of alcohol and/or other drugs significantly impairs a person’s health and results in an inability for them to meet major responsibilities at work, school, or home
a psychoactive compound with the potential for dependence and detrimental effects
the person begins to feel physical or emotional upset when they are not using a substance
